name: AVAudioCompressedBuffer
desc: An object that represents an audio buffer that you use for compressed audio formats.

items.name: init(format: AVAudioFormat, packetCapacity: AVAudioPacketCount)
items.desc: Creates a buffer that contains constant bytes per packet of audio data in a compressed state.

items.name: init(format: AVAudioFormat, packetCapacity: AVAudioPacketCount, maximumPacketSize: Int)
items.desc: Creates a buffer that contains audio data in a compressed state.

items.name: var byteCapacity: UInt32
items.desc: The number of packets the buffer contains.

items.name: var byteLength: UInt32
items.desc: The number of valid bytes in the buffer.

items.name: var maximumPacketSize: Int
items.desc: The maximum size of a packet, in bytes.

items.name: var packetCapacity: AVAudioPacketCount
items.desc: The total number of packets that the buffer can contain.

items.name: var packetCount: AVAudioPacketCount
items.desc: The number of packets currently in the buffer.

items.name: typealias AVAudioPacketCount
items.desc: The number of packets of audio data.

items.name: var packetDescriptions: UnsafeMutablePointer<AudioStreamPacketDescription>?
items.desc: The buffer’s array of packet descriptions.
